title: Il silenzio dell'acqua
overview: The disappearance of the adolescent Laura Mancini is the starting point, dramatic and disquieting, of an investigation that will bring to light the dark side and the secrets hidden behind the respectable facade of a small village on the sea. The enthralling detective, among false tracks, hidden truths and secret relationships, will discover that nobody is as it seems until the arrival to a surprising epilogue.
